statements: SELECT * FROM production_defects;
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, defect_description FROM production_defects WHERE defect_type='Critical';
SELECT defect_type, COUNT(*) FROM production_defects GROUP BY defect_type;
SELECT * FROM production_defects ORDER BY defect_date DESC;
SELECT defect_type, defect_description FROM production_defects WHERE defect_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM production_defects WHERE defect_id = 1;
SELECT defect_type, COUNT(*) FROM production_defects GROUP BY defect_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT defect_description FROM production_defects WHERE production_line_id = 3 AND YEAR(defect_date) = 2022;
SELECT defect_type, COUNT(*) AS total_defects FROM production_defects GROUP BY defect_type HAVING total_defects > 5 ORDER BY defect_type;
SELECT * FROM production_defects WHERE defect_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY defect_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM defect_rates;
SELECT defect_type, defect_severity FROM defect_rates ORDER BY defect_severity DESC;
SELECT * FROM defect_rates WHERE defect_type='Critical' AND defect_severity > 5;
SELECT production_date, defect_severity FROM defect_rates WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, production_speed, defect_rate FROM production_line ORDER BY production_speed ASC;
SELECT * FROM defect_rates WHERE defect_type = 'software' ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, production_speed FROM production_line WHERE production_speed > 100 ORDER BY defect_rate ASC;
SELECT id, defect_type, defect_severity FROM defect_rates WHERE defect_severity > 3 AND production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_name, defect_rate FROM production_line WHERE defect_rate < 0.05 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT id, defect_severity, production_date FROM defect_rates WHERE defect_severity > 1 AND defect_type LIKE '%hardware%' ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM defect_reports;
SELECT defect_type, production_line_id FROM defect_reports;
SELECT production_line_id, defect_type, defect_date FROM defect_reports WHERE defect_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT line_name FROM production_lines WHERE supervisor_id = 101;
SELECT reduction_method, outcome FROM waste_reduction;
SELECT * FROM defect_reports WHERE production_line_id = 1
SELECT * FROM production_lines WHERE supervisor_id = 3
SELECT defect_type, production_line_id FROM defect_reports WHERE defect_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT line_name, supervisor_id FROM production_lines WHERE line_id = 2
SELECT reduction_method, implementation_date, outcome FROM waste_reduction ORDER BY implementation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM defect_rate;
SELECT product_name, defect_type, defect_count FROM defect_rate WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT defect_type, SUM(defect_count) AS total_defects FROM defect_rate GROUP BY defect_type;
SELECT product_name, defect_type, defect_count FROM defect_rate ORDER BY defect_count DESC;
SELECT product_name, defect_type, defect_count FROM defect_rate WHERE defect_type = 'Design Flaw' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM defect_rate ORDER BY product_name ASC, defect_count DESC;
SELECT product_name, defect_type, defect_count FROM defect_rate WHERE defect_type='Mechanical' AND defect_count > 10 ORDER BY defect_count DESC;

SELECT dr.product_name, dl.location, da.analysis_date FROM defect_rate dr JOIN defect_location dl ON dr.id = dl.defect_id JOIN defect_analysis da ON dr.id = da.defect_id WHERE dl.area='Production' AND da.improvement_areas IS NOT NULL ORDER BY da.analysis_date ASC;

SELECT pl.line_number, pl.line_manager, COUNT(dr.id) AS total_defects FROM production_line pl LEFT JOIN defect_rate dr ON pl.id = dr.id GROUP BY pl.line_number, pl.line_manager ORDER BY total_defects DESC;

SELECT pl.line_number, COUNT(da.id) AS total_analyses, AVG(dr.defect_count) AS avg_defect_count FROM production_line pl LEFT JOIN defect_analysis da ON pl.id = da.defect_id LEFT JOIN defect_rate dr ON da.defect_id = dr.id GROUP BY pl.line_number ORDER BY avg_defect_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionLineDefects;
SELECT defect_name, defect_category FROM ProductionLineDefects WHERE defect_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT defect_name, defect_description FROM ProductionLineDefects WHERE defect_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM ProductionLineEntries ORDER BY product_id ASC, entry_date DESC;
SELECT worker_id, worker_name, hire_date FROM ProductionLineWorkers WHERE worker_role = 'Engineer';
SELECT * FROM ProductionLineDefects WHERE defect_category = 'Electrical';
SELECT defect_name, defect_description FROM ProductionLineDefects ORDER BY defect_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity_produced FROM ProductionLineEntries WHERE quantity_produced > 100 ORDER BY quantity_produced DESC;
SELECT worker_name, worker_role FROM ProductionLineWorkers WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, area_for_improvement FROM ProductionLineAnalysis WHERE area_for_improvement IS NOT NULL ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
